name: Garlic Lemony Caulirice
description: Discover the delightful flavors of Garlic Lemony Caulirice, a perfect dish for anyone seeking a healthy and vibrant meal. This low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar recipe brings together the freshness of cauliflower, red onion, yellow bell pepper, and garlic, with a zesty twist of lemon. It's an ideal choice for those looking for nourishing healthified recipes that don't sacrifice taste.
recipeIngredient: 1  tsp ground (2.3 g), Black Pepper - Ground

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the cauliflower, red onion, and yellow bell pepper under cold water.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the cauliflower into florets, dice the red onion, and chop the yellow bell pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a food processor, pulse the cauliflower florets until they reach a rice-like consistency.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet over medium heat, sauté the diced red onion and chopped yellow bell pepper for about 5 minutes, until softened.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Add the minced garlic to the skillet and cook for an additional 1 minute, until fragrant.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the cauliflower rice, and continue to sauté for about 8 minutes, until the cauliflower is tender.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: Season with salt and ground black pepper to taste.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the lemon juice and cook for an additional 2 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
